AWS_S3_BUCKET.description: Name of the S3 bucket where the images are hosted. By default, this is a shared, read-only bucket containing the FIX demo images.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Amazon Web Services key ID with write permissions to the S3 bucket. Required only if you plan to add/edit products & kits in Spree

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Secret for the given Amazon Web Services key ID.

AWS_REGION.description: Amazon Web Services region. Only change if the app is intentionally deployed to another region.

FIX_DEMO.description: Leave this blank if you want to deploy an empty storefront without the  sample products or custom FIX home screen.

DEPLOYMENT.description: Indicates the runtime location of the app; used to regulate behaviors which are different when running at Heroku

LANG.description: Default locale & character encoding to use in app runtime

RAILS_SERVE_STATIC_FILES.description: Rails on Heroku should server its own static content; unset this var if a web server is in front of Spree

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A unique secret used by Rails to generate and verify signed cookies (among other things)
